page.title: 11Family Life in Monmouth 1.
page.content: Anthony On a{weekday....}I get up at 6.00am. and I dress.Then I go and watch out for the postman because he sometimes likes a cup of tea.Then I have my breakfast. Dad goes off at 7.30.At 8.00 mum takes me to school and collects me at 3.30pm then shopping.We get home at 5.00pm I do my homework.Dad comes home at 6.00pm.Then I have my tea.At 6.25 I go and{play with my friend Robert.At 8.00 I come home to look after my sister while Mum and Dad go to Tesco because its cheaper than local shops.At 9.00 I watch the News and the Weather.I go to bed at 9.35pm. On a{Sunday....}I get up at 7.00 and I have breakfast We go to 8.00 mass. After Church we go swimming in town We get home at 11.00 then mow the lawn. After lunch we visit interesting places.
